img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/95/Wukong_MiddleHollow_18.jpg)
On your right, you will cross a small walkway to find some Spider Cocoons blocking a doorway. Destroy them to find the Drink inside.
img_below_text: There aren't too many Drinks in the game compared to the Soaks, so be sure to keep your eye out for them. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character has just cleared a doorway blocked by Spider Cocoons. Inside the room, a glowing object, likely a valuable item referred to as a "Drink," is highlighted. The image serves to guide players on where to find this rare item within the game.
